DOC.brief_summary: We aim determine effectiveness 2013 `` Mag paDRE ka '' programme increase general public awareness prostate health promote prostate health assessment among Filipino male age 40 old .
DOC.brief_title: 2013 Annual National Digital Rectal Exam ( DRE ) Day Study
DOC.detailed_description: Convenience sample method apply collect complete Philippine Urological Association ( PUA ) survey form 11 Philippine Board Urology accredit training institution . A data collection form purpose study use extract data Philippine Urological Association survey form . The data collection form study extract data , include basic demographic characteristic patient ( age educational attainment ) , family history prostate cancer , medical condition , history prior prostate screening/ consultation Lower urinary tract Symptoms prostate disease . The International Prostate Symptom score ( IPSS ) collect stratified accord mild ( 1-7 ) , moderate ( 8-19 ) severe ( 20-35 ) Filipino version Quality Life ( QoL ) rating stratify accord Grade 1 , grade 2 grade 3 . DRE finding include approximation prostate size prostate characteristic finding cluster normal size ( 20grams less ) versus enlarge ( > 20grams 2 fingerbreadth width ) , nodular v non-nodular , doughy hard , tender versus non-tender . Participants classify accord follow : 1 . Target population screening : Target population screen define Filipino male age 40 year old , also previous consultation Lower urinary tract symptom ( LUTS ) prostate cancer screen past 12 month 2 . Case Finding significant LUTS prostate cancer : Case LUTS prostate cancer define Filipino male age 40 year old IPSS > 8 , OR , abnormal Digital rectal exam ( DRE ) finding , define nodular OR hard OR tender . However , DRE find enlarged prostate non-nodular , doughy character non-tender consider case LUTS prostate cancer suspect ) . Confidentiality data assure . The case report forms/ data collection form study contain patient identifier . All patient record cod electronic database serial number PUA-designated Institutional code ( i.e . SLMC # 0001 ) . Only investigator study authorized personnel PUA give access study data . The PUA survey form secure , file accessed PUA secretariat building . The electronic database cod data data collection study set password , study investigator access password .
